mapper.insert: insert into chart(cname, rrn, disease, operation, operd, enterd, exitd, dcode) values(#{cname},#{rrn},#{disease},#{operation},#{operd},#{enterd},#{exitd},#{dcode});
mapper.select:
select * from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, b.* from chart b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp
where cname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where dcode like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where cname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR dcode like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by cno desc ) as chartlist
where rownum > (#{pagenum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum}*#{amount}

select count(*) from chart
where cname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where dcode like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where cname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR dcode like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
